statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE account_number = 1001;
SELECT customer_id, energy_usage, billing_amount FROM customers WHERE address = '123 Main St';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE energy_usage >= 100 AND billing_amount <= 200;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address, account_number, energy_usage, billing_amount FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE energy_usage > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, billing_amount FROM customers WHERE account_number = 123456;
SELECT customer_name, billing_amount FROM customers ORDER BY billing_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE billing_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY energy_usage ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_consumed > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY address DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, reading_date, energy_consumed FROM customers INNER JOIN energy_consumption ON customers.customer_id = energy_consumption.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_name, bill_amount FROM customers JOIN billing ON customers.customer_id = billing.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumed_units > 100 ORDER BY consumption_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, bill_amount FROM customers JOIN billing ON customers.customer_id = billing.customer_id WHERE payment_status = false;

SELECT customer_name, SUM(consumed_units) AS total_units_consumed FROM customers JOIN energy_consumption ON customers.customer_id = energy_consumption.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_units_consumed DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, bill_amount FROM customers LEFT JOIN billing ON customers.customer_id = billing.customer_id WHERE bill_amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers;
SELECT meter_location, meter_type FROM energy_meters;
SELECT * FROM energy_billing ORDER BY billing_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, customer_address, meter_location, billing_amount FROM customers JOIN energy_meters ON customers.customer_id = energy_meters.customer_id JOIN energy_billing ON energy_meters.meter_id = energy_billing.meter_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '555%';
SELECT * FROM energy_meters WHERE meter_type = 'Electricity' ORDER BY meter_id DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, energy_billing.billing_date, energy_billing.total_energy_consumed FROM customers INNER JOIN energy_meters ON customers.customer_id = energy_meters.customer_id JOIN energy_billing ON energy_meters.meter_id = energy_billing.meter_id WHERE energy_billing.billing_amount > 1000;
SELECT SUM(energy_units_consumed) AS total_consumption, MAX(energy_units_consumed) AS max_consumption FROM energy_consumption_tracking GROUP BY meter_id HAVING total_consumption > 500;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3
SELECT meter_type, installation_date FROM meters
SELECT invoice_date, total_amount FROM invoices WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY invoice_date
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT meter_id, meter_type, installation_date FROM meters ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_date, total_amount FROM invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT p.payment_id, p.payment_date, i.total_amount FROM payments p JOIN invoices i ON p.invoice_id = i.invoice_id;
